Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Prohibits the use of restraints on incarcerated individuals during labor, absent extraordinary circumstances, and on pregnant persons during a custodial interrogation
Summary: Prohibits the use of restraints on incarcerated individuals during labor, absent extraordinary circumstances, and on pregnant persons during a custodial interrogation.
LawCode: Amd ยง611, Cor L; add ยง837-y, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law and the executive law, in relation to prohibiting the use of restraints on incarcerated individuals during labor, absent extraordinary circumstances, and on pregnant persons during a custodial interrogation
